product_name: Craft PR Featherlight Jacket - Men's - Black - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The black Craft PR Featherlight men's jacket fends off the elements so you can run like the wind, even on chilly days. Wind-resistant nylon fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish, causing water to bead up and roll off, keeping you dry in light rain. Polyester mesh paneling on shoulders and sides alows ventilation and enhances breathability. Droptail hem increases coverage in the back; 6 in. of elastic in center of hem helps keep the jacket in place witthout restricting movement. Tricot-lined collar adds a touch of warmth; reflective details add visibility. The Craft PR Featherlight running jacket features a full-length zipper for immediate ventilation when you need to cool off. Hidden on-seam side pocket; jacket can be packed into the pocket when not in use. Closeout.
short_description: The black Craft PR Featherlight men's jacket fends off the elements so you can run like the wind, even on chilly days.
